input.sentences: the tent was set up in the city on a hot day .
then they waited for customers to arrive .
they put a sign out by the street .
after that they were set up for business .
output.sentences: People were sitting under the tent because it was hot.
A lot of people there had came on their bikes.
When the cyclists arrived they had to wait.
But there was valet for their bikes so it wasn't so bad.
Everything went smoothly and business went well.
